Shuowen 说文解字:

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 苧 from grass-top 艹艸 cǎo and phonetic cowry-vice (㝉)宁 zhù. name- plant-lemonene (苧)薴 níng name- plant-boehmeria (苎)苧 zhù new-char 苎

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
Simplification caused confusion for these two plant names. 薴 níng traditional lemonene became 苧 níng limonene. 苧 zhù traditional boehmeria had to become 苎 zhù boehmeria.

Simplification rule : 薴⇄苧 苧⇄苎

苧字的基本解释

苧
（薴）
zhù
同“苎”。

苧
（薴）
níng
有机化合物，有香味的液体，存在于柑橘类果皮中，供制香料。

苧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhù］
［《廣韻》直吕切，上語，澄。］
“苎1”的繁体字。
植物名。苧麻。

苧字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　苧； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1024第01
【唐韻】直呂切【集韻】丈呂切，?音佇。草名。可爲繩。【張衡·南都賦】其草則藨苧薠莞。【王褒·僮約】多取蒲苧，益作繩索。【本草】取苧根和米粉爲餠禦饑，味甘美。　又苧蘿，山名。【吳越春秋】苧蘿山鬻薪之女曰西施、鄭旦。　又【集韻】陳如切，音除。義同。又通作紵。【詩·陳風】東門之池，可以漚紵。【註】苧同。亦作芧。

考證：〔【張衡·南都賦】其草則藨苧蘋莞。〕　謹照原文蘋莞改薠莞。
苧字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
苧字的起名意思

一种有香味的液体机化合物，也是多年生草本植物。

Ramie

zhù

níng

Ramie
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhù］
["Guang Yun" Zhi Lu Qi, on the language, Cheng. ]
Traditional characters for "苎1".
Botanical name. Ramie.
Ramie
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　苎; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1024 No. 01
[Tang Yun] Zhi Lv Che [Ji Yun] Zhang Lv Che, the sound line. Cursive name. Can be rope. 【Zhang Heng·Nandu Fu】The grass is Ribes ramie Wan. 【Wang Bao·Tong Yue】Take more Puju to make ropes. 【Materia Medica】Take ramie roots and rice noodles to protect against hunger and taste sweet.　Yuan Luo, the name of the mountain. [Wu Yue Chun Qiu] The daughters of Wuxin from Mount Ramuluo say Xi Shi and Zheng Dan.　 [Ji Yun] Chen Ruqie, the sound is divided. The same meaning. Also pass as a string. 【Poetry·Chen Feng】The East Gate Pool can be used for retting. [Note] Ramie is the same. Also as 芧. Textual research: [[Zhang Heng·Nandu Fu] The grass is the ramie and the wan. 〕　I would like to change Ping Wan to Ping Wan according to the original text.
